question: I suffer from acne and as a result i have blood stains on my shirts Even after washing these the stains remain, can i offer salaat in these shirts
answer:
QUESTION
I suffer from acne and as a result i have blood stains on my shirts Even after washing these the stains remain, can i offer salaat in these shirts or not because if i change into unstained shirts they too get stained. JazaakAllahKhair
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible to use the garments after washing them even though the stains remain.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
